days.title: Day 3: Parallel Execution & Thread Safety
days.focus: Configure parallel execution with ThreadLocal and Selenium Grid

tasks.title: Implement ThreadLocal for WebDriver
tasks.description: Ensure thread safety for parallel test execution

tasks.title: Configure TestNG parallel execution
tasks.description: Set up parallel execution at method, class, and test level

tasks.title: Setup Selenium Grid with Docker
tasks.description: Create docker-compose configuration for Grid

tasks.title: Monitor and optimize parallel execution
tasks.description: Identify bottlenecks and optimize thread pool size

practice.title: Thread-Safe Framework
practice.description: Refactor framework to support parallel execution across multiple browsers
practice.code:
// testng.xml
<suite name="Parallel Suite" parallel="tests" thread-count="3">
    <test name="Chrome Tests">
        <parameter name="browser" value="chrome"/>
        <classes>
            <class name="com.tests.LoginTest"/>
        </classes>
    </test>
    <test name="Firefox Tests">
        <parameter name="browser" value="firefox"/>
        <classes>
            <class name="com.tests.LoginTest"/>
        </classes>
    </test>
</suite>
